GSD36pars2_pu:2: vyāsam ekāgram āsīnam apṛcchann ṛṣayaḥ purā (I,1, p. 37) // Par_1.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:3: mānuṣāṇāṃ hitaṃ dharmaṃ vartamāne kalau yuge /
GSD36pars2_pu:4: śaucācāraṃ yathāvac ca vada satyavatīsuta // Par_1.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:7: na cāhaṃ sarvatattvajñaḥ kathaṃ dharmaṃ vadāmy ahaṃ /
GSD36pars2_pu:8: asmatpitaiva praṣṭavya iti vyāsaḥ suto 'bravīt // Par_1.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:10: ṛṣiṃ vyāsaṃ puraskṛtya gatā badarikāśramam (I,1, p. 68) // Par_1.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:17: kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā vyāsas tu ṛṣibhiḥ saha /
GSD36pars2_pu:20: āha susvāgataṃ brūhīty āsīno munipuṅgavaḥ (I,1, p. 75) // Par_1.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:21: kuśalaṃ samyag ity uktvā vyāsaḥ pṛcchaty anantaram /
GSD36pars2_pu:22: yadi jānāsi bhaktiṃ me snehād vā bhaktavatsala (I,1, p. 77) // Par_1.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:23: dharmaṃ kathaya me tāta anugrāhyo hy ahaṃ tava /
GSD36pars2_pu:24: śrutā me mānavā dharmā vāsiṣṭhā kāśyapās tathā (I,1, p. 78) // Par_1.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:25: gargeyā gautamīyāś ca tathā cośanasā smṛtāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:26: atrer viṣṇoś ca saṃvartād dakṣād aṅgirasas tathā // Par_1.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:27: śātātapāc ca hārītād yājñavalkyāt tathaiva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:28: āpastambakṛtā dharmā śaṅkhasya likhitasya ca // Par_1.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:30: śrutā hy ete bhavatproktāḥ śrutyarthā me na vismṛtāḥ (I,1, p. 79) //
GSD36pars2_pu:32: sarve dharmāḥ kṛte jātāḥ sarve naṣṭāḥ kalau yuge (I,1, p. 80) // Par_1.16
GSD36pars2_pu:34: caturṇām api varṇānāṃ kartavyaṃ dharmakovidaiḥ (I,1, p. 87) // Par_1.17 //
GSD36pars2_pu:35: brūhi dharmasvarūpajña sūkṣmaṃ sthūlaṃ ca vistarāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:36: vyāsavākyāvasāne tu munimukhyaḥ parāśaraḥ (I,1, p. 92) // Par_1.18 //
GSD36pars2_pu:37: dharmasya nirṇayaṃ prāha sūkṣmaṃ sthūlaṃ ca vistarāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:38: śṛṇu putra pravakṣyāmi śṛṇvantu munayas tathā (I,1, p. 93) // Par_1.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:41: na kaścid vedakartā ca vedaṃ smṛtvā caturmukhaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:42: tathaiva dharmān smarati manuḥ kalpāntare 'ntare (I,1, p. 112) // Par_1.21
GSD36pars2_pu:43: anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare yuge /
GSD36pars2_pu:44: anye kaliyuge nṝṇāṃ yugarūpānusārataḥ (I,1, p. 117) // Par_1.22 //
GSD36pars2_pu:45: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñānam ucyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:46: dvāpare yajñam evāhuḥ dānam eva kalau yuge (I,1, p. 119) // Par_1.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:47: kṛte tu mānavā dharmās tretāyāṃ gautamāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:48: dvāpare śāṅkhalikhitāḥ kalau pārāśarāḥ smṛtāḥ (I,1, p. 122) // Par_1.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:49: tyajed deśaṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ grāmam utsṛjet /
GSD36pars2_pu:50: dvāpare kulam ekaṃ tu kartāraṃ tu kalau yuge // Par_1.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:51: kṛte saṃbhāṣaṇād eva tretāyāṃ sparśanena ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:52: dvāpare tv annam ādāya kalau patati karmaṇā (I,1, p. 123) // Par_1.26 //
GSD36pars2_pu:53: kṛte tātkālikaḥ śāpas tretāyāṃ daśabhir dinaiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:54: dvāpare caikamāsena kalau saṃvatsareṇa tu // Par_1.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:55: abhigamya kṛte dānaṃ tretāsv āhūya dīyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:56: dvāpare yācamānāya sevayā dīyate kalau // Par_1.28 //
GSD36pars2_pu:58: adhamaṃ yācamānāya sevādānaṃ tu niṣphalam (I,1, p. 124) // Par_1.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:59: jito dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ caivānṛtena ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:60: jitāś coraiś ca rājānaḥ strībhiś ca puruṣāḥ kalau // Par_1.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:62: kumāryaś ca prasūyante asmin kaliyuge sadā (I,1, p. 125) // Par_1.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:63: kṛte tv asthigatāḥ prāṇās tretāyāṃ māṃsam āśritāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:64: dvāpare rudhiraṃ caiva kalau tv annādiṣu sthitāḥ (I,1, p. 126) // Par_1.32
GSD36pars2_pu:65: yuge yuge ca ye dharmās tatra tatra ca ye dvijāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:66: teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyā yugarūpā hi te dvijāḥ (I,1, p. 128) // Par_1.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:67: yuge yuge tu sāmarthyaṃ śeṣaṃ munivibhāṣitam /
GSD36pars2_pu:68: parāśareṇa cāpy uktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate (I,1, p. 131) // Par_1.34 //
GSD36pars2_pu:69: aham adyaiva tat sarvam anusmṛtya bravīmi vaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:72: cintitaṃ brāhmaṇārthāya dharmasaṃsthāpanāya ca (I,1, p. 141) // Par_1.36
GSD36pars2_pu:74: ācārabhraṣṭadehānāṃ bhaved dharmaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ (I,1, p. 143) // Par_1.37
GSD36pars2_pu:76: hutaśeṣaṃ tu bhuñjāno brāhmaṇo nāvasīdati (I,1, p. 145) // Par_1.38 //
GSD36pars2_pu:78: ātithyaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca ṣaṭkarmāṇi dine dine (I,1, p. 218) // Par_1.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:79: iṣṭo vā yadi vā dveṣyo mūrkhaḥ paṇḍita eva vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:82: atithiṃ taṃ vijānīyān nātithiḥ pūrvam āgataḥ (I,1, p. 396) // Par_1.41 //
GSD36pars2_pu:84: anityam āgato yasmāt tasmād atithir ucyate (I,1, p. 398) // Par_1.42 //
GSD36pars2_pu:88: gacchantaṃ cānuyānena prītim utpādayed gṛhī (I,1, p. 400) // Par_1.44 //
GSD36pars2_pu:90: pitaras tasya nāśnanti daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca (I,1, p. 401) // Par_1.45 //
GSD36pars2_pu:92: atithir yasya bhagnāśas tasya homo nirarthakaḥ (I,1, p. 402) // Par_1.46
GSD36pars2_pu:93: sukṣetre vāpayed bījaṃ supātre nikṣiped dhanam /
GSD36pars2_pu:94: sukṣetre ca supātre ca hy uptaṃ dattaṃ na naśyati (I,1, p. 403) //
GSD36pars2_pu:95: na pṛcched gotracaraṇe na svādhyāyaṃ śrutaṃ tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:96: hṛdaye kalpayed devaṃ sarvadevamayo hi saḥ (I,1, p. 404) // Par_1.48 //
GSD36pars2_pu:97: apūrvaḥ suvratī vipro hy apūrvaś cātitihir yathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:98: vedābhyāsarato nityaṃ tāv apūrvau dine dine (I,1, p. 406) // Par_1.49 //
GSD36pars2_pu:99: vaiśvadeve tu saṃprāpte bhikṣuke gṛham āgate /
GSD36pars2_pu:100: uddhṛtya vaiśvadevārthaṃ bhikṣukaṃ tu visarjayet (I,1, p. 408) // Par_1.50
GSD36pars2_pu:101: yatiś ca brahmacārī ca pakvānnasvāmināv ubhau /
GSD36pars2_pu:102: tayor annam adattvā tu bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // Par_1.51 //
GSD36pars2_pu:104: icchayā ca tato dadyād vibhave satyavāritam (I,1, p. 409) // Par_1.52 //
GSD36pars2_pu:105: yatihaste jalaṃ dadyād bhaikṣaṃ dadyāt punar jalam /
GSD36pars2_pu:106: tad bhaikṣyaṃ meruṇā tulyaṃ taj jalaṃ sāgaropamam // Par_1.53 //
GSD36pars2_pu:107: yasya chatraṃ hayaś caiva kuñjarāroham ṛddhimat /
GSD36pars2_pu:108: aindraṃ sthānam upāsīta tasmāt taṃ na vicārayet (I,1, p. 410) // Par_1.54
GSD36pars2_pu:110: na hi bhikṣukṛtān doṣān vaiśvadevo vyapohati (I,1, p. 411) // Par_1.55 //
GSD36pars2_pu:111: akṛtvā vaiśvadevaṃ tu bhuñjate ye dvijādhamāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:112: sarve te niṣphalā jñeyāḥ patanti narake 'śucau (I,1, p. 412) // Par_1.56
GSD36pars2_pu:114: sarve te narakaṃ yānti kākayoniṃ vrajanti ca // Par_1.57 //
GSD36pars2_pu:115: pāpo vā yadi caṇḍālo vipraghnaḥ pitṛghātakaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:116: vaiśvadeve tu saṃprāptaḥ so 'tithiḥ svargasaṃkramaḥ // Par_1.58 //
GSD36pars2_pu:117: yo veṣṭitaśirā bhuṅkte yo bhuṅkte dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:118: vāmapāde karaṃ nyasya tad vai rakṣāṃsi bhuñjate (I,1, p. 413) // Par_1.59
GSD36pars2_pu:119: avratā hy anadhīyānā yatra bhaikṣacarā dvijāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:120: taṃ grāmaṃ daṇḍayed rājā corabhaktaprado hi saḥ (I,1, p. 445) // Par_1.60
GSD36pars2_pu:121: kṣatriyo hi prajā rakṣañ śastrapāṇiḥ pradaṇḍavān /
GSD36pars2_pu:122: nirjitya parasainyāni kṣitiṃ dharmeṇa pālayet // Par_1.61 //
GSD36pars2_pu:123: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinuyān mūlacchedaṃ na kārayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:125: lābhakarma tathā ratnaṃ gavāṃ ca paripālanam /
GSD36pars2_pu:126: kṛṣikarma ca vāṇijyaṃ vaiśyavṛttir udāhṛtā (I,1, p. 476) // Par_1.63 //
GSD36pars2_pu:128: anyathā kurute kiṃcit tad bhavet tasya niṣphalam (I,1, p. 480) // Par_1.64
GSD36pars2_pu:129: lavaṇaṃ madhutailaṃ ca dadhitakraṃ ghṛtaṃ payaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:130: na duṣyec chūdrajātīnāṃ kuryāt sarveṣu vikrayam (I,1, p. 484) // Par_1.65
GSD36pars2_pu:131: vikrīṇan madhyamāṃsāni hy abhakṣasya ca bhakṣaṇam /
GSD36pars2_pu:132: kurvann agamyā gamanaṃ śūdraḥ patati tatkṣaṇāt (I,1, p. 486) // Par_1.66
GSD36pars2_pu:136: ataḥ paraṃ gṛhasthasya karmācāraṃ kalau yuge /
GSD36pars2_pu:137: dharmaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ śaktyā cāturvarṇyāśramāgatam (I,2, p. 1) // Par_2.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:138: taṃ pravakṣyāmy ahaṃ pūrvaṃ parāśaravaco yathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:139: ṣaṭkarmasahito vipraḥ kṛṣikarma ca kārayet (I,2, p. 3) // Par_2.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:140: kṣudhitaṃ tṛṣitaṃ śrāntaṃ balīvardaṃ na yojayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:141: hīnāṅgaṃ vyādhitaṃ klībaṃ vṛṣaṃ vipro na vāhayet (I,2, p. 6) // Par_2.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:143: vāhayed divasasyārdhaṃ paścāt snānaṃ samācaret // Par_2.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:144: japyaṃ devārcanaṃ homaṃ svādhyāyaṃ caivam abhyaset /
GSD36pars2_pu:145: ekadvitricatur viprān bhojayet snātakān dvijaḥ (I,2, p. 8) // Par_2.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:146: svayaṃkṛṣṭe tathā kṣetre dhānyaiś ca svayamarjitaiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:147: nirvapet pañca yajñāṃś ca kratudīkṣāṃ ca kārayet (I,2, p. 9) // Par_2.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:148: tilā rasā na vikreyā vikreyā dhānyatatsamāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:150: brāhmaṇaś cet kṛṣiṃ kuryāt tanmahādoṣam āpnuyāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:151: saṃvatsareṇa yat pāpaṃ matsyaghātī samāpnuyāt (I,2, p. 13) // Par_2.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:153: pāśako matsyaghātī ca vyādhaḥ śākunikas tathā // Par_2.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:154: adātā karṣakaś caiva sarve te samabhāginaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:155: vṛkṣaṃ chittvā mahīṃ bhittvā hatvā ca kṛmikīṭakān // Par_2.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:157: yo na dadyād dvijātibhyo rāśimūlam upāgataḥ (I,2, p. 14) // Par_2.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:158: sa cauraḥ sa ca pāpiṣṭho brahmaghnaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet /
GSD36pars2_pu:159: rājñe dattvā tu ṣaḍbhāgaṃ devānāṃ caikaviṃśakam (I,2, p. 15) // Par_2.12
GSD36pars2_pu:161: kṣatriyo 'pi kṛṣiṃ kṛtvā devān viprāṃś ca pūjayet // Par_2.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:163: vikarma kurvate śūdrā dvijaśuśrūṣayojjhitāḥ (I,2, p. 16) // Par_2.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:164: bhavanty alpāyuṣas te vai nirayaṃ yānty asaṃśayaṃ /
GSD36pars2_pu:165: caturṇām api varṇānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Par_2.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:166: ataḥ śuddhiṃ pravakṣyāmi janane maraṇe tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:167: dinatrayeṇa śudhyanti brāhmaṇāḥ pretasūtake (I,2, p. 204) // Par_3.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:169: śūdraḥ śudhyati māsena parāśaravaco yathā // Par_3.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:170: upāsane tu viprāṇām aṅgaśuddhiś ca jāyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:171: brāhmaṇānāṃ prasūtau tu dehasparśo vidhīyate (I,2, p. 212) // Par_3.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:173: vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśāhena śūdro māsena śudhyati (I,2, p. 213) // Par_3.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:175: tryahāt kevalavedas tu dvihīno daśabhir dinaiḥ (I,2, p. 215) // Par_3.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:177: nāmadhārakavipras tu daśāhaṃ sūtakī bhavet (I,2, p. 217) // Par_3.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:179: janmany api vipattau ca teṣāṃ tat sūtakaṃ bhavet (I,2, p. 219) // Par_3.7
GSD36pars2_pu:180: tāvat tat sūtakaṃ gotre caturthapuruṣeṇa tu /
GSD36pars2_pu:181: dāyād vicchedam āpnoti pañcamo vātmavaṃśajaḥ (I,2, p. 221) // Par_3.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:182: caturthe daśarātraṃ syāt ṣaṇṇiśāḥ puṃsi pañcame /
GSD36pars2_pu:183: ṣaṣṭhe caturahāc chuddhiḥ saptame tu dinatrayāt (I,2, p. 222) // Par_3.9
GSD36pars2_pu:185: bāle prete ca saṃnyaste sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate (I,2, p. 223) // Par_3.10
GSD36pars2_pu:187: na trirātram ahorātraṃ sadyaḥ snātvā śucir bhavet (I,2, p. 232) //
GSD36pars2_pu:189: dehanāśam anuprāptas tithir na jñāyate yadi (I,2, p. 236) // Par_3.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:190: kṛṣṇāṣṭamī tv amāvāsyā kṛṣṇā caikādaśī ca yā /
GSD36pars2_pu:191: udakaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ ca tatra śrāddhaṃ ca kārayet // Par_3.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:192: ajātadantā ye bālā ye ca garbhād viniḥsṛtāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:193: na teṣām agnisaṃskāro nāśaucaṃ nodakakriyā (I,2, p. 237) // Par_3.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:194: yadi garbho vipadyeta sravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:195: yāvanmāsaṃ sthito garbho dinaṃ tāvat tu sūtakam (I,2, p. 238) // Par_3.15
GSD36pars2_pu:196: ā caturthād bhavet srāvaḥ pātaḥ pañcamaṣaṣṭhayoḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:197: ata ūrdhvaṃ prasūtiḥ syād daśāhaṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet (I,2, p. 240) // Par_3.16
GSD36pars2_pu:199: agnisaṃskaraṇe teṣāṃ trirātram aśucir bhavet (I,2, p. 241) // Par_3.16/1
GSD36pars2_pu:200: ā dantajanmanaḥ sadya ā cūḍān naiṣikī smṛtā /
GSD36pars2_pu:201: trirātram ā vratādeśād daśarātram ataḥ param (I,2, p. 243) // Par_3.17 //
GSD36pars2_pu:202: brahmacārī gṛhe yeṣāṃ hūyate ca hutāśanaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:203: saṃparkaṃ na ca kurvanti na teṣāṃ sūtakaṃ bhavet (I,2, p. 253) // Par_3.18
GSD36pars2_pu:204: saṃparkād duṣyate vipro janane maraṇe tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:205: saṃparkāc ca nivṛttasya na pretaṃ naiva sūtakam (I,2, p. 254) // Par_3.19
GSD36pars2_pu:206: śilpinaḥ kārukā vaidyā dāsīdāsāś ca nāpitāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:207: rājānaḥ śrotriyāś caiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // Par_3.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:208: savrataḥ satrapūtaś ca āhitāgniś ca yo dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:209: rājñaś ca sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchati pārthivaḥ (I,2, p. 255) // Par_3.21
GSD36pars2_pu:210: udyato nidhane dāne ārto vipro nimantritaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:211: tadaiva ṛṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ yathā kālena śudhyati // Par_3.22 //
GSD36pars2_pu:212: prasave gṛhamedhī tu na kuryāt saṃkaraṃ yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:213: daśāhāc chudhyate mātā tv avagāhya pitā śuciḥ (I,2, p. 259) // Par_3.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:214: sarveṣāṃ śāvam āśaucaṃ mātā pitros tu sūtakam /
GSD36pars2_pu:215: sūtakaṃ mātur eva syād upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ // Par_3.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:216: yadi patnyāṃ prasūtāyāṃ saṃparkaṃ kurute dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:217: sūtakaṃ tu bhavet tasya yadi vipraḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit (I,2, p. 260) // Par_3.25
GSD36pars2_pu:218: saṃparkāj jāyate doṣo nānyo doṣo 'sti vai dvije /
GSD36pars2_pu:219: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena saṃparkaṃ varjayed budhaḥ (I,2, p. 261) // Par_3.26
GSD36pars2_pu:221: pūrvasaṃkalpitaṃ dravyaṃ dīyamānaṃ na duṣyati (I,2, p. 262) // Par_3.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:223: tāvat syād aśucir vipro yāvat tat syād anirdaśam (I,2, p. 263) // Par_3.28
GSD36pars2_pu:225: āhaveṣu vipannānām ekarātram aśaucakam (I,2, p. 268) // Par_3.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:227: parivrāḍ yogayuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukho hataḥ // Par_3.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:228: yatra yatra hataḥ śūraḥ śatrubhiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:229: akṣayāṃl labhate lokān yadi klībaṃ na bhāṣate (I,2, p. 269) // Par_3.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:230: saṃnyastaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānāc calati bhāskaraḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:231: eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā paraṃ sthānaṃ prayāsyati (I,2, p. 270) // Par_3.32
GSD36pars2_pu:232: yas tu bhagneṣu sainyeṣu vidravatsu samantataḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:233: paritrātā yadā gacchet sa ca kratuphalaṃ labhet (I,2, p. 271) // Par_3.33
GSD36pars2_pu:235: devakanyās tu taṃ vīraṃ haranti ramayanti ca // Par_3.34 //
GSD36pars2_pu:237: tvaramāṇāḥ pradhāvanti mama bhartā mameti ca (I,2, p. 272) // Par_3.35 //
GSD36pars2_pu:238: yaṃ yajñasaṃghais tapasā ca viprāḥ svargaiṣiṇo vātra yathā yānti /
GSD36pars2_pu:239: kṣaṇena yānty eva hi tatra vīrāḥ prāṇān suyuddhena parityajantaḥ //
GSD36pars2_pu:241: kṣaṇadhvaṃsini kāye 'smin kā cintā maraṇe raṇe (I,2, p. 273) // Par_3.37
GSD36pars2_pu:242: lalāṭadeśe rudhiraṃ sravac ca yasyāhave tu praviśec ca vaktram /
GSD36pars2_pu:243: tat somapānena kilāsya tulyaṃ saṃgrāmayajñe vidhivac ca dṛṣṭam // Par_3.38
GSD36pars2_pu:244: anāthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pretaṃ ye vahanti dvijātayaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:245: pade pade yajñaphalam ānupūrvyāṃl labhanti te (I,2, p. 274) // Par_3.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:246: na teṣām aśubhaṃ kiṃcit pāpaṃ vā śubhakarmaṇām /
GSD36pars2_pu:249: vahitvā ca dahitvā ca prāṇāyāmena śudhyati (I,2, p. 275) // Par_3.41 //
GSD36pars2_pu:250: anugamyecchayā pretaṃ jñātim ajñātim eva vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:251: snātvā sacailaṃ spṛṣṭvāgniṃ ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati (I,2, p. 280) //
GSD36pars2_pu:253: ekāham aśucir bhūtvā pañcagavyena śudhyati (I,2, p. 281) // Par_3.43 //
GSD36pars2_pu:254: śavaṃ ca vaiśyam ajñānād brāhmaṇo yo 'nugacchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:255: kṛtvāśaucaṃ dvirātraṃ ca prāṇāyāmān ṣaḍ ācaret (I,2, p. 282) // Par_3.44
GSD36pars2_pu:256: pretībhūtaṃ tu yaḥ śūdraṃ brāhmaṇo jñānadurbalaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:257: anugacchen nīyamānaṃ trirātram aśucir bhavet // Par_3.45 //
GSD36pars2_pu:258: trirātre tu tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gatvā samudragām /
GSD36pars2_pu:259: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // Par_3.46 //
GSD36pars2_pu:261: dvijais tadānugantavyā eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ (I,2, p. 283) // Par_3.47 //
GSD36pars2_pu:263: Prāyaścittakāṇḍam atimānād atikrodhāt snehād vā yadi vā bhayāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:264: udbadhnīyāt strī pumān vā gatir eṣā vidhīyate (II,1, p. 18) // Par_4.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:266: ṣaṣṭhīr varṣasahasrāṇi narakaṃ pratipadyate (II,1, p. 19) // Par_4.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:267: nāśaucaṃ nodakaṃ nāgniṃ nāśrupātaṃ ca kārayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:270: gobhir hataṃ tathodbaddhaṃ brāhmaṇena tu ghātitam (II,1, p. 25) // Par_4.4
GSD36pars2_pu:271: saṃspṛśanti tu ye viprā voḍhāraś cāgnidāś ca ye /
GSD36pars2_pu:272: anye ye vānugantāraḥ pāśacchedakarāś ca ye // Par_4.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:274: anaḍutsahitāṃ gāṃ ca dadyur viprāya dakṣiṇām // Par_4.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:275: tryaham uṣṇaṃ pibed vāri tryaham uṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibet /
GSD36pars2_pu:276: tryaham uṣṇaṃ pibet sarpir vāyubhakṣo dinatrayam (II,1, p. 26) // Par_4.7
GSD36pars2_pu:277: ṣaṭpalaṃ tu pibed ambhas tripalaṃ tu payaḥ pibet /
GSD36pars2_pu:278: palam ekaṃ pibet sarpis taptakṛcchraṃ vidhīyate // Par_4.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:279: yo vai samācared vipraḥ patitādiṣv akāmataḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:280: pañcāhaṃ vā daśāhaṃ vā dvādaśāham athāpi vā (II,1, p. 27) // Par_4.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:281: māsārdhaṃ māsam ekaṃ vā māsadvayam athāpi vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:282: abdārdham abdam ekaṃ vā tad ūrdhvaṃ caiva tatsamaḥ // Par_4.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:283: trirātraṃ prathame pakṣe dvitīye kṛcchram ācaret /
GSD36pars2_pu:284: tṛtīye caiva pakṣe tu kṛcchraṃ sāṃtapanaṃ caret (II,1, p. 29) // Par_4.11
GSD36pars2_pu:285: caturthe daśarātraṃ syāt parākaḥ pañcame mataḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:286: kuryāc cāndrāyaṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhe saptame tv aindavadvayam // Par_4.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:287: śuddhyartham aṣṭame caiva ṣaṇ māsān kṛcchram ācaret /
GSD36pars2_pu:288: pakṣasaṃkhyāpramāṇena suvarṇāny api dakṣiṇā (II,1, p. 30) // Par_4.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:289: ṛtusnātā tu yā nārī bhartāraṃ nopasarpati /
GSD36pars2_pu:290: sā mṛtā narakaṃ yāti vidhavā ca punaḥ punaḥ (II,1, p. 33) // Par_4.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:291: ṛtusnātāṃ tu yo bhāryāṃ saṃnidhau nopagacchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:292: ghorāyāṃ bhrūṇahatyāyāṃ yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Par_4.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:294: sā śunī jāyate mṛtvā sūkarī ca punaḥ punaḥ // Par_4.16 //
GSD36pars2_pu:295: patyau jīvati yā nārī upoṣya vratam ācaret /
GSD36pars2_pu:296: āyuṣyaṃ harate bhartuḥ sā nārī narakaṃ vrajet // Par_4.17 //
GSD36pars2_pu:297: apṛṣṭvā caiva bhartāraṃ yā nārī kurute vratam /
GSD36pars2_pu:298: sarvaṃ tad rākṣasān gacched ity evaṃ manur abravīt (II,1, p. 34) //
GSD36pars2_pu:299: bāndhavānāṃ sajātīnāṃ durvṛttaṃ kurute tu yā /
GSD36pars2_pu:300: garbhapātaṃ ca yā kuryān na tāṃ saṃbhāṣayet kvacit // Par_4.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:302: prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāḥ syāt tasyās tyāgo vidhīyate // Par_4.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:303: na kāryam āvasathyena nāgnihotreṇa vā punaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:304: sa bhavet karmacāṇḍālo yas tu dharmaparāṅmukhaḥ // Par_4.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:306: sa kṣetrī labhate bījaṃ na bījī bhāgam arhati (II,1, p. 42) // Par_4.22 //
GSD36pars2_pu:307: tadvat parastriyāḥ putrau dvau smṛtau kuṇḍagolakau /
GSD36pars2_pu:308: patyau jīvati kuṇḍaḥ syāt mṛte bhartari golakaḥ // Par_4.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:309: aurasaḥ kṣetrajaś caiva dattaḥ kṛtrimakaḥ sutaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:310: dadyān mātā pitā vāpi sa putro dattako bhavet (II,1, p. 48) // Par_4.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:312: sarve te narakaṃ yānti dātṛyājakapañcamāḥ // Par_4.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:313: dvau kṛcchrau parivittes tu kanyāyāḥ kṛcchra eva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:314: kṛcchrātikṛcchrau dātus tu hotā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret // Par_4.26 //
GSD36pars2_pu:316: jātyandhe badhire mūke na doṣaḥ parivedane (II,1, p. 51) // Par_4.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:318: dārāgnihotrasamyoge na doṣaḥ parivedane (II,1, p. 52) // Par_4.28 //
GSD36pars2_pu:319: jyeṣṭho bhrātā yadā tiṣṭhed ādhānaṃ naiva kārayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:320: anujñātas tu kurvīta śaṅkhasya vacanaṃ yathā // Par_4.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:321: naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau /
GSD36pars2_pu:322: pañcasv āpatsu nārīṇāṃ patir anyo vidhīyate (II,1, p. 53) // Par_4.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:323: mṛte bhartari yā nārī brahmacaryavrate sthitā /
GSD36pars2_pu:324: sā mṛtā labhate svargaṃ yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ // Par_4.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:325: tisraḥ koṭyo 'rdhakoṭī ca yāni romāṇi mānuṣe /
GSD36pars2_pu:326: tāvatkālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati (II,1, p. 54) // Par_4.32
GSD36pars2_pu:327: vyālagrāhī yathā vyālaṃ balād uddharate bilāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:328: evaṃ strī patim uddhṛtya tenaiva saha modate (II,1, p. 57) // Par_4.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:330: snātvā japet sa gāyatrīṃ pavitrāṃ vedamātaram (II,1, p. 61) // Par_5.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:331: gavāṃ śṛṅgodakaiḥ snānaṃ mahānadyos tu saṃgame /
GSD36pars2_pu:332: samudradarśanād vāpi śunā daṣṭaḥ śucir bhavet // Par_5.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:334: sa hiraṇyodakaiḥ snātvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati (II,1, p. 62) // Par_5.3
GSD36pars2_pu:335: savratas tu śunā daṣṭo yas trirātram upāvaset /
GSD36pars2_pu:336: ghṛtaṃ kuśodakaṃ pītvā vrataśeṣaṃ samāpayet // Par_5.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:337: avrataḥ savrato vāpi śunā daṣṭo bhaved dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:338: praṇipatya bhavet pūto vipraiś cakṣurnirīkṣitaḥ // Par_5.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:340: adbhiḥ prakṣālanaṃ proktam agninā copacūlanam // Par_5.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:341: śunā tu brāhmaṇī daṣṭā jambukena vṛkeṇa vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:342: uditaṃ grahanakṣatraṃ dṛṣṭvā sadyaḥ śucir bhavet // Par_5.7 //
GSD36pars2_pu:343: kṛṣṇapakṣe yadā somo na dṛśyeta kadācana /
GSD36pars2_pu:344: yāṃ diśaṃ vrajate somas tāṃ diśaṃ vāvalokayet // Par_5.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:346: vṛṣaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sadyaḥ snātvā śucir bhavet // Par_5.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:347: caṇḍālena śvapākena gobhir viprair hato yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:348: āhitāgnir mṛto vipro viṣeṇātmahato yadi (II,1, p. 69) // Par_5.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:349: dahet taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vipro lokāgnau mantravarjitam /
GSD36pars2_pu:350: spṛṣṭvā voḍhvā ca dagdhvā ca sapiṇḍeṣu ca sarvathā // Par_5.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:352: dagdhāsthīni punar gṛhya kṣīraiḥ prakṣālayed dvijaḥ (II,1, p. 70) //
GSD36pars2_pu:353: punar dahet svāgninā tu svatantreṇa pṛthak pṛthak /
GSD36pars2_pu:354: āhitāgnir dvijaḥ kaścit pravasan kālacoditaḥ (II,1, p. 71) // Par_5.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:358: ṣaṭśatāni śataṃ caiva palāśānāṃ ca vṛntataḥ // Par_5.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:359: catvāriṃśac chire dadyāc chataṃ kaṇṭhe tu vinyaset /
GSD36pars2_pu:360: bāhubhyāṃ śatakaṃ dadyād aṅgulīṣu daśaiva tu (II,1, p. 72) // Par_5.16 //
GSD36pars2_pu:361: śataṃ tu jaghane dadyād dviśataṃ tūdare tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:362: dadyād aṣṭau vṛṣaṇayoḥ pañca medhre tu vinyaset // Par_5.17 //
GSD36pars2_pu:364: pādāṅgulīṣu ṣaḍ dadyād yajñapātraṃ tato nyaset // Par_5.18 //
GSD36pars2_pu:365: śamyaṃ śiśne viniḥkṣipya araṇīṃ muṣkayor api /
GSD36pars2_pu:366: juhūṃ ca dakṣiṇe haste vāme tūpabhṛtaṃ nyaset // Par_5.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:367: karṇe colūkhalaṃ dadyāt pṛṣṭhe ca musalaṃ nyaset /
GSD36pars2_pu:368: urasi kṣipya dṛṣadaṃ taṇḍulājyatilān mukhe // Par_5.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:369: śrotre ca prokṣaṇīṃ dadyād ājyasthalīṃ tu cakṣuṣoḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:370: karṇe netre mukhe ghrāṇe hiraṇyaśakalaṃ nyaset // Par_5.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:372: asau svargāya lokāya svāhety ekāhutiṃ sakṛt (II,1, p. 73) // Par_5.22 //
GSD36pars2_pu:373: dadyāt putro 'thavā bhrātāpy anyo vāpi ca bāndhavaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:374: yathā dahanasaṃskāras tathā kāryaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Par_5.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:375: īdṛśaṃ tu vidhiṃ kuryād brahmalokagatiḥ smṛtā /
GSD36pars2_pu:376: dahanti ye dvijās taṃ tu te yānti paramāṃ gatim (II,1, p. 74) // Par_5.24
GSD36pars2_pu:377: anyathā kurvate karma tv ātmabuddhyā pracoditāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:378: bhavanty alpāyuṣas te vai patanti narake 'śucau // Par_5.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:380: parāśarena pūrvoktā manvarthe 'pi ca vistṛtām (II,1, p. 77) // Par_6.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:382: jālapādaṃ ca śarabham ahorātreṇa śudhyati (II,1, p. 78) // Par_6.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:384: ahinakravighātī ca śudhyate naktabhojanāt (II,1, p. 79) // Par_6.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:386: antarjala ubhe saṃdhye prāṇāyāmena śudhyati (II,1, p. 80) // Par_6.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:388: apakvāśī dinaṃ tiṣṭhet trikālaṃ mārutāśanaḥ (II,1, p. 81) // Par_6.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:392: bhāradvājādikaṃ hatvā śivaṃ pūjya viśudhyati (II,1, p. 83) // Par_6.7 //
GSD36pars2_pu:394: pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sarveṣām ahorātram abhojanam // Par_6.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:396: kṛsaraṃ bhojayed viprān lohadaṇḍaś ca dakṣiṇā (II,1, p. 85) // Par_6.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:397: śiśumāraṃ tathā godhāṃ hatvā kūrmaṃ ca śalyakam /
GSD36pars2_pu:398: vṛntākaphalabhakṣī cāpy ahorātreṇa śudhyati (II,1, p. 87) // Par_6.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:400: tilaprasthaṃ dvije dadyād vāyubhakṣo dinatrayam (II,1, p. 89) // Par_6.11
GSD36pars2_pu:402: prāyaścittam ahorātraṃ trisaṃdhyam avagāhanam (II,1, p. 90) // Par_6.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:403: kuraṅgaṃ vānaraṃ siṃhaṃ citraṃ vyāghraṃ tu ghātayan /
GSD36pars2_pu:404: śudhyate sa trirātreṇa viprāṇāṃ tarpaṇena ca (II,1, p. 91) // Par_6.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:406: aphālakṛṣṭam aśnīyād ahorātram upoṣya saḥ (II,1, p. 92) // Par_6.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:408: ahorātroṣitas tiṣṭhej japed vai jātavedasam (II,1, p. 93) // Par_6.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:409: śilpinaṃ kārukaṃ śūdraṃ striyaṃ vā yas tu ghātayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:411: vaiśyaṃ vā kṣatriyaṃ vāpi nirdoṣaṃ yo 'bhighātayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:412: so 'pi kṛcchradvayaṃ kuryād goviṃśad dakṣiṇāṃ dadet (II,1, p. 95) //
GSD36pars2_pu:414: hatvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ tasya triṃśad goś caiva dakṣiṇām (II,1, p. 105) //
GSD36pars2_pu:415: caṇḍālaṃ hatavān kaścid brāhmaṇe yadi kaṃcana /
GSD36pars2_pu:416: prājāpatyaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ godvayaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadat (II,1, p. 106) //
GSD36pars2_pu:418: caṇḍālasya vadhe prāpte kṛcchrārdhena viśudhyati // Par_6.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:420: ahorātroṣitaḥ snātvā pañcagavyena śudhyati (II,1, p. 107) // Par_6.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:421: śvapākaṃ vāpi caṇḍālaṃ vipraḥ saṃbhāṣate yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:422: divjasaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kuryāt sāvitrīṃ tu sakṛj japet (II,1, p. 108) // Par_6.22
GSD36pars2_pu:423: caṇḍālaiḥ saha suptaṃ tu trirātram upavāsayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:426: caṇḍālasparśane caiva sacailaṃ snānam ācaret (II,1, p. 109) // Par_6.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:428: ajñānāc caikabhaktena tv ahorātreṇa śudhyati (II,1, p. 111) // Par_6.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:430: gomūtrayāvakāhāras trirātrāc chuddhim āpnuyāt (II,1, p. 112) // Par_6.26
GSD36pars2_pu:431: caṇḍālaghaṭasaṃsthaṃ tu yat toyaṃ pibati dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:432: tatkṣaṇāt kṣipate yas tu prājāpatyaṃ samācaret // Par_6.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:433: yadi na kṣipate toyaṃ śarīre yasya jīryati /
GSD36pars2_pu:434: prājāpatyaṃ na dātavyaṃ kṛcchraṃ sāṃtapanaṃ caret // Par_6.28 //
GSD36pars2_pu:436: tadardhaṃ tu cared vaiśyaḥ pādaṃ śūdras tad ācaret (II,1, p. 113) //
GSD36pars2_pu:437: bhāṇḍastham antyajānāṃ tu jalaṃ dadhi payaḥ pibet /
GSD36pars2_pu:438: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś caiva pramādataḥ (II,1, p. 114) //
GSD36pars2_pu:440: śūdrasya copavāsena tathā dānena śaktitaḥ // Par_6.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:444: daśāhaṃ niyamasthasya vrataṃ tat tu vinirdiśet (II,1, p. 116) // Par_6.33
GSD36pars2_pu:445: avijñātas tu caṇḍālo yatra veśmani tiṣṭhati /
GSD36pars2_pu:446: vijñāte tu7pasannasya dvijāḥ kurvanty anugraham (II,1, p. 118) // Par_6.34
GSD36pars2_pu:448: patantam uddhareyus taṃ dharmajñāḥ pāpasaṃkarāt // Par_6.35 //
GSD36pars2_pu:450: bhuñjīta saha sarvaiś ca trisaṃdhyam avagāhanam (II,1, p. 119) // Par_6.36
GSD36pars2_pu:451: tryahaṃ bhuñjīta dadhnā ca tryahaṃ bhuñjīta sarpiṣā /
GSD36pars2_pu:452: tryahaṃ kṣīreṇa bhuñjīta ekaikena dinatrayam // Par_6.37 //
GSD36pars2_pu:454: dadhikṣīrasya tripalaṃ palaṃ ekaṃ ghṛtasya tu (II,1, p. 120) // Par_6.38
GSD36pars2_pu:455: bhasmanā tu bhavec chuddhir ubhayos tāmrakāṃsyayoḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:458: dvāre kṛtvā tu dhānyāni dadyād veśmani pāvakam // Par_6.40 //
GSD36pars2_pu:459: evaṃ śuddhas tataḥ paścāt kuryād brāhmaṇatarpaṇam /
GSD36pars2_pu:460: triṃśataṃ govṛṣaṃ caikaṃ dadyād vipreṣu dakṣiṇām (II,1, p. 121) //
GSD36pars2_pu:462: ādhāreṇa ca viprāṇāṃ bhūmidoṣo na vidyate // Par_6.42 //
GSD36pars2_pu:463: caṇḍālaiḥ saha saṃparkaṃ māsaṃ māsārdham eva vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:466: cāturvarṇyasya ca gṛhe tv avijñātā tu tiṣṭhati (II,1, p. 123) // Par_6.44
GSD36pars2_pu:467: jñātvā tu niṣkṛtiṃ kuryāt pūrvoktasyārdham eva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:468: gṛhadāhaṃ na kurvīta śeṣaṃ sarvaṃ ca kārayet (II,1, p. 124) // Par_6.45 //
GSD36pars2_pu:470: tam agārād vinirvāsya mṛdbhāṇḍaṃ tu visarjayet // Par_6.46 //
GSD36pars2_pu:471: rasapūrṇaṃ tu yad bhāṇḍaṃ na tyajet tu kadācana /
GSD36pars2_pu:472: gomayena tu saṃmiśrair jalaiḥ prokṣed gṛhaṃ tathā // Par_6.47 //
GSD36pars2_pu:474: kṛmir utpadyate yasya prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 126) //
GSD36pars2_pu:476: tryahaṃ snātvā ca pītvā ca kṛmiduṣṭaḥ śucir bhavet // Par_6.49 //
GSD36pars2_pu:478: godakṣiṇāṃ tu vaiśyasyāpy upavāsaṃ vinirdiśet // Par_6.50 //
GSD36pars2_pu:479: śūdrāṇāṃ nopavāsaḥ syāc chūdro dānena śudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:480: acchidram iti yad vākyaṃ vadanti kṣitidevatāḥ (II,1, p. 127) // Par_6.51
GSD36pars2_pu:481: praṇamya śirasā grāhyam agniṣṭomaphalaṃ hi tat /
GSD36pars2_pu:482: japac chidraṃ tapac chidraṃ yac chidraṃ yajñakarmaṇi (II,1, p. 128) //
GSD36pars2_pu:486: athavā brāhmaṇās tuṣṭāḥ sarvaṃ kurvanty anugraham (II,1, p. 129) //
GSD36pars2_pu:488: durbale 'nugrahaḥ proktas tathā vai bālavṛddhayoḥ (II,1, p. 130) //
GSD36pars2_pu:489: ato 'nyathā bhaved doṣas tasmān nānugrahaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:490: snehād vā yadi vā lobhād bhayād ajñānato 'pi vā (II,1, p. 131) // Par_6.56
GSD36pars2_pu:491: kurvanty anugrahaṃ ye tu tat pāpaṃ teṣu gacchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:492: śarīrasyātyaye prāpte vadanti niyamaṃ tu ye (II,1, p. 132) // Par_6.57 //
GSD36pars2_pu:494: svasthasya mūḍhāḥ kurvanti vadanty aniyamaṃ tu ye (II,1, p. 133) //
GSD36pars2_pu:496: svayam eva vrataṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇaṃ yo 'vamanyate // Par_6.59 //
GSD36pars2_pu:497: vṛthā tasyopavāsaḥ syān na sa puṇyena yujyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:498: sa eva niyamo grāhyo yady eko 'pi vaded dvijaḥ (II,1, p. 134) // Par_6.60
GSD36pars2_pu:499: kuryād vākyaṃ dvijānāṃ tu anyathā bhrūṇahā bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:500: brāhmaṇā jaṅgamaṃ tīrthaṃ tīrthabhūtā hi sādhavaḥ // Par_6.61 //
GSD36pars2_pu:502: brāhmaṇā yāni bhāṣante manyante tāni devatāḥ (II,1, p. 135) // Par_6.62 //
GSD36pars2_pu:504: upavāso vrataṃ caiva snānaṃ tīrthaṃ japas tapaḥ (II,1, p. 136) // Par_6.63
GSD36pars2_pu:505: viprasaṃpāditaṃ yasya saṃpūrṇaṃ tasya tat phalam /
GSD36pars2_pu:507: tadantarā spṛśec cāpas tad annaṃ bhasmanā spṛśet /
GSD36pars2_pu:508: bhuñjānaś caiva yo vipraḥ pādaṃ hastena saṃspṛśet // Par_6.65 //
GSD36pars2_pu:509: svam ucchiṣṭam asau bhuṅkte pāṇinā muktabhājane /
GSD36pars2_pu:510: pādukāstho na bhuñjīta paryaṅke saṃsthito 'pi vā (II,1, p. 138) //
GSD36pars2_pu:512: yad annaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ syād annaśuddhis tathaiva ca // Par_6.67 //
GSD36pars2_pu:516: kākaśvānāvalīḍhaṃ tu droṇānnaṃ na parityajet (II,1, p. 140) // Par_6.69 //
GSD36pars2_pu:518: prasthā dvātriṃśatir droṇaḥ smṛto dviprastha āḍhakaḥ // Par_6.70 //
GSD36pars2_pu:520: kākaśvānāvalīḍhaṃ tu gavāghrātaṃ khareṇa vā (II,1, p. 141) // Par_6.71 //
GSD36pars2_pu:521: svalpam annaṃ tyajed vipraḥ śuddhir droṇāḍhake bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:522: annasyoddhṛtya tan.mātraṃ yac ca lālāhataṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 142) //
GSD36pars2_pu:526: sneho vā goraso vāpi tatraśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 144) // Par_6.74
GSD36pars2_pu:531: dāravāṇāṃ pātrāṇāṃ takṣaṇāc chuddhir iṣyate (II,1, p. 147) // Par_7.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:533: rajasā śudhyate nārī vikalaṃ yā na gacchati (II,1, p. 150) // Par_7.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:534: nadī vegena śudhyeta lopo yadi na dṛśyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:537: aṣṭavarṣā bhaved gaurī navavarṣā tu rohiṇī (II,1, p. 156) // Par_7.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:538: daśavarṣā bhavet kanyā ata ūrdhvaṃ rajasvalā /
GSD36pars2_pu:539: prāpte tu dvādaśe varṣe yaḥ kanyāṃ na prayacchati (II,1, p. 157) //
GSD36pars2_pu:540: māsi māsi rajas tasyāḥ pibanti pitaraḥ svayam /
GSD36pars2_pu:541: mātā caiva pitā caiva jyeṣṭho bhrātā tathaiva ca (II,1, p. 158) // Par_7.6
GSD36pars2_pu:542: trayas te narakaṃ yānti dṛṣṭvā kanyāṃ rajasvalām /
GSD36pars2_pu:543: yas tāṃ samudvahet kanyāṃ brāhmaṇo madamohitaḥ // Par_7.7 //
GSD36pars2_pu:544: asaṃbhāṣyo hy apāṅkteyaḥ sa vipro vṛṣalīpatiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:545: yaḥ karoty ekarātreṇa vṛṣalīsevanaṃ dvijaḥ (II,1, p. 159) // Par_7.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:546: sa bhaikṣabhuj japan nityaṃ tribhir varṣair viśudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:547: astaṃgate yadā sūrye caṇḍālaṃ patitaṃ striyam // Par_7.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:548: sūtikāṃ spṛśataś caiva kathaṃ śuddhir vidhīyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:549: jātavedaḥ suvarṇaṃ ca somamārgaṃ vilokya ca // Par_7.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:551: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇī tathā (II,1, p. 160) //
GSD36pars2_pu:553: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā tathā // Par_7.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:554: ardhakṛcchraṃ caret pūrvā pādam ekam anantarā /
GSD36pars2_pu:555: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ brāhmaṇī vaiśyajā tathā // Par_7.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:556: pādahīnaṃ caret pūrvā pādam ekam anantarā /
GSD36pars2_pu:557: spṛṣṭvā rajasvalānyonyaṃ brāhmaṇī śūdrajā tathā // Par_7.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:558: kṛcchreṇa śudhyate pūrvā śūdrā dānena śudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:559: snātā rajasvalā yā tu caturthe 'hani śudhyati (II,1, p. 164) // Par_7.15
GSD36pars2_pu:560: kuryād rajo nivṛttau tu daivapitryādi karma ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:561: rogeṇa yad rajaḥ strīṇām anvahaṃ tu pravartate (II,1, p. 165) // Par_7.16
GSD36pars2_pu:562: nāśuciḥ sā tatas tena tat syād vaikālikaṃ matam /
GSD36pars2_pu:563: sādhvācārā na tāvat syād rajo yāvat pravartate (II,1, p. 168) // Par_7.17
GSD36pars2_pu:564: rajonivṛttau gamyā strī gṛhakarmaṇi caiva hi /
GSD36pars2_pu:567: āture snānotpanne daśakṛtvo hy anāturaḥ (II,1, p. 169) // Par_7.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:568: snātvā snātvā spṛśed enaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:569: ucchiṣṭocchiṣṭasaṃspṛṣṭaḥ śunā śūdreṇa vā dvijaḥ (II,1, p. 170) //
GSD36pars2_pu:571: anucchiṣṭena śūdreṇa sparśe snānaṃ vidhīyate (II,1, p. 171) // Par_7.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:573: bhasmanā śudhyate kāṃsyaṃ surayā yan na lipyate (II,1, p. 172) // Par_7.22
GSD36pars2_pu:575: gavāghrātāni kāṃsyāni śvakākopahatāni ca (II,1, p. 172) // Par_7.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:576: śudhyanti daśabhiḥ kṣāraiḥ śūdrocchiṣṭāni yāni ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:577: gaṇḍūṣaṃ pādaśaucaṃ ca kṛtvā vai kāṃsyabhājane // Par_7.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:578: ṣaṇmāsān bhuvi niḥkṣipya uddhṛtya punar āharet /
GSD36pars2_pu:579: āyaseṣv āyasānāṃ ca sīsasyāgnau viśodhanam (II,1, p. 173) // Par_7.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:580: dantam asthi tathā bhṛṅgaṃ rūpyaṃ sauvarṇabhājanam /
GSD36pars2_pu:581: maṇipāṣāṇapātrāṇīty etān prakṣālayej jalaiḥ (II,1, p. 174) // Par_7.26 //
GSD36pars2_pu:582: pāṣāṇe tu punar gharṣaḥ śuddhir evam udāhṛtā /
GSD36pars2_pu:583: mṛṇmaye dahanāc chuddhir dhānyānāṃ mārjanād api (II,1, p. 176) // Par_7.27
GSD36pars2_pu:585: aurṇanetrapaṭānāṃ ca prokṣaṇāc chuddhir iṣyate (II,1, p. 179) // Par_7.28
GSD36pars2_pu:587: tṛṇakāṣṭhasya rajjūṇām udakābhyukṣaṇaṃ matam (II,1, p. 181) // Par_7.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:589: śoṣayitvātapenaiva prokṣaṇāc chuddhitām iyuḥ (II,1, p. 184) // Par_7.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:591: medhyāmedhyaṃ spṛśanto 'pi nocchiṣṭaṃ manur abravīt (II,1, p. 185) //
GSD36pars2_pu:592: mahīṃ spṛṣṭvāgataṃ toyaṃ yāś cāpy anyonyavipruṣaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:593: bhuktocchiṣṭaṃ tathā snehaṃ nocchiṣṭaṃ manur abravīt (II,1, p. 186) //
GSD36pars2_pu:595: madhuparke ca some ca nocchiṣṭaṃ dharmato viduḥ // Par_7.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:598: aduṣṭā saṃtatā dhārā vātoddhūtāś ca reṇavaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:599: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca na duṣyanti kadācana (II,1, p. 188) // Par_7.35
GSD36pars2_pu:600: deśabhaṅge pravāse vā vyādhiṣu vyasaneṣv api /
GSD36pars2_pu:601: rakṣed eva svadehādi- paścād dharmaṃ samācaret (II,1, p. 196) // Par_7.36
GSD36pars2_pu:602: yena kena ca dharmeṇa mṛdunā dāruṇena vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:603: uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret (II,1, p. 197) // Par_7.37
GSD36pars2_pu:604: āpatkāle tu nistīrṇe śaucācāraṃ tu cintayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:605: śuddhiṃ samuddharet paścāt svastho dharmaṃ samācaret // Par_7.38 //
GSD36pars2_pu:607: akāmakṛtapāpasya prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 199) // Par_8.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:609: svakarmarataviprāṇāṃ svakaṃ pāpaṃ nivedayet (II,1, p. 205) // Par_8.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:611: ajñānāt kṛṣikartāro brāhmaṇā nāmadhārakāḥ (II,1, p. 207) // Par_8.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:613: sahasraśaḥ sametānāṃ pariṣattvaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 209) // Par_8.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:614: yad vadanti tamomūḍhā mūrkhā dharmam atadvidaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:615: tat pāpaṃ śatadhā bhūtvā tadvaktṝn adhigacchati (II,1, p. 210) // Par_8.5
GSD36pars2_pu:617: prāyaścittī bhavet pūtaḥ kilbiṣaṃ parṣadi vrajet // Par_8.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:618: catvāro vā trayo vāpi yaṃ brūyur vedapāragāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:619: sa dharmeti vijñeyo netarais tu sahasraśaḥ (II,1, p. 212) // Par_8.7 //
GSD36pars2_pu:620: pramāṇamārgaṃ mārganto ye dharmaṃ pravadanti vai /
GSD36pars2_pu:623: evaṃ pariṣadādeśān nāśayet tasya duṣkṛtam (II,1, p. 213) // Par_8.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:624: naiva gacchati kartāraṃ naiva gacchati parṣadam /
GSD36pars2_pu:625: mārutārkādisamyogāt pāpaṃ naśyati toyavat (II,1, p. 214) // Par_8.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:627: brāhmaṇānāṃ samarthā ye pariṣat sābhidhīyate (II,1, p. 215) // Par_8.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:629: pañca trayo vā dharmajñāḥ pariṣat sā prakīrtitā // Par_8.12 //
GSD36pars2_pu:631: vedavrateṣu snātānām eko 'pi pariṣad bhavet // Par_8.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:632: pañca pūrvaṃ mayā proktās teṣāṃ cāsaṃbhave trayaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:633: svavṛttiparituṣṭo ye pariṣat sā prakīrtitā // Par_8.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:634: ata ūrdhvaṃ tu ye viprāḥ kevalaṃ nāmadhārakāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:635: pariṣattvaṃ na teṣv asti sahasraguṇiteṣv api (II,1, p. 218) // Par_8.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:636: yathā kāṣṭhamayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:637: brāhmaṇas tv anadhīyānas trayas te nāmadhārakāḥ // Par_8.16 //
GSD36pars2_pu:638: grāmasthānaṃ yathā śūnyaṃ yathā kūpas tu nirjalaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:639: yathā hutam anagnau ca amantro brāhmaṇas tathā (II,1, p. 219) // Par_8.17
GSD36pars2_pu:640: yathā ṣaṇḍho 'phalaḥ strīṣu yathā gaur ūṣarāphalā /
GSD36pars2_pu:641: yathā cājñe 'phalaṃ dānaṃ tathā vipro 'nṛco 'phalaḥ (II,1, p. 220) //
GSD36pars2_pu:643: brāhmaṇyam api tadvad dhi saṃskārair mantrapurvakaiḥ (II,1, p. 221) //
GSD36pars2_pu:645: te dvijā pāpakarmāṇaḥ sametā narakaṃ yayuḥ // Par_8.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:646: ye paṭhanti dvijā vedaṃ pañcayajñaratāś ca ye /
GSD36pars2_pu:647: trailokyaṃ tārayanty ete pañcendriyaratā api (II,1, p. 222) // Par_8.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:649: evaṃ ca vedavid vipraḥ sarvabhakṣo 'pi daivatam (II,1, p. 224) // Par_8.22
GSD36pars2_pu:651: tathaiva kilbiṣaṃ sarvaṃ prakṣipec ca dvijānale (II,1, p. 227) // Par_8.23
GSD36pars2_pu:652: gāyatrīrahito vipraḥ śūdrād apy aśucir bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:654: duḥśīlo 'pi dvijaḥ pūjyo na tu śūdro jitendriyaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:655: kaḥ parityajya gāṃ duṣṭāṃ duhec chīlavatīṃ kharīm (II,1, p. 228) //
GSD36pars2_pu:657: krīḍārtham api yad brūyuḥ sa dharmaḥ paramaḥ smṛtaḥ (II,1, p. 229) //
GSD36pars2_pu:659: trayaś ca āśramo mukhyāḥ parṣad eṣā daśāvarā (II,1, p. 230) // Par_8.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:661: svayam eva na kartavyaṃ kartavyā svalpaniṣkṛtiḥ (II,1, p. 232) // Par_8.28
GSD36pars2_pu:662: brāhmaṇāṃs tān atikramya rājā kartuṃ yad icchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:663: tat pāpaṃ śatadhā bhūtvā rājānam anugacchati (II,1, p. 233) // Par_8.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:665: ātmakṛcchraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā japed vai vedamātaram // Par_8.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:667: gavāṃ madhye vased rātrau divā gāś cāpy anuvrajet (II,1, p. 237) //
GSD36pars2_pu:668: uṣṇe varṣati śīte vā mārute vāti vā bhṛśam /
GSD36pars2_pu:669: na kurvītātmanas trāṇaṃ gor akṛtvā tu śaktitaḥ (II,1, p. 238) // Par_8.32
GSD36pars2_pu:670: ātmano yadi vānyeṣāṃ gṛhe kṣetre khale 'tha vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:671: bhakṣayantīṃ na kathayet pibantaṃ caiva vatsakam // Par_8.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:673: patitāṃ paṅkamagnāṃ vā sarvaprāṇaiḥ samuddharet (II,1, p. 239) // Par_8.34
GSD36pars2_pu:674: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe vā yas tu prāṇān parityajet /
GSD36pars2_pu:675: mucyate brahmahatyāyā goptā gor brāhmaṇasya ca // Par_8.35 //
GSD36pars2_pu:677: prājāpatyaṃ tataḥ kṛcchraṃ vibhajet tac caturvidham (II,1, p. 240) //
GSD36pars2_pu:679: ayācitāśy ekam ahar ekāhaṃ mārutāśanaḥ // Par_8.37 //
GSD36pars2_pu:681: dinadvayam ayācī syād dvidinaṃ mārutāśanaḥ // Par_8.38 //
GSD36pars2_pu:683: dinatrayam ayācī syāt tridinaṃ mārutāśanaḥ // Par_8.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:685: caturdinam ayācī syāc caturahaṃ mārutāśanaḥ (II,1, p. 241) // Par_8.40 //
GSD36pars2_pu:687: viprāṇāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāt pavitrāṇi japed dvijaḥ // Par_8.41 //
GSD36pars2_pu:688: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu goghnaḥ śuddho na saṃśayaḥ // Par_8.41/1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:690: tad vadhaṃ tu na taṃ vidyāt kāmākāmakṛtaṃ tathā (II,1, p. 255) // Par_9.1
GSD36pars2_pu:691: daṇḍād ūrdhvaṃ yad anyena prahārād yadi pātayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:692: prāyaścittaṃ tadā proktaṃ dviguṇaṃ govadhe caret (II,1, p. 256) // Par_9.2
GSD36pars2_pu:694: ekapādaṃ cared rodhe dvau pādau bandhane caret (II,1, p. 257) // Par_9.3
GSD36pars2_pu:695: yoktreṣu pādahīnaṃ syāc caret sarvaṃ nipātane /
GSD36pars2_pu:696: govāṭe vā gṛhe vāpi durge vāpy asamasthale (II,1, p. 258) // Par_9.4 //
GSD36pars2_pu:697: nadīṣv atha samudreṣu tv anyeṣu na nadīmukhe /
GSD36pars2_pu:698: dagdhadeśe mṛtā gāvaḥ stambhanād rodha ucyate (p. 259) (II,1, p. 259) //
GSD36pars2_pu:700: gṛhe vāpi vane vāpi baddhā syād gaur mṛtā yadi // Par_9.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:701: tad eva bandhanaṃ vidyāt kāmākāmakṛtaṃ ca yat /
GSD36pars2_pu:702: hale vā śakaṭe paṅktau pṛṣṭhe vā pīḍito naraiḥ (II,1, p. 260) // Par_9.7
GSD36pars2_pu:703: gopatir mṛtyum āpnoti yoktro bhavati tadvadhaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:704: mattaḥ pramatta unmattaś cetano vāpy acetanaḥ (II,1, p. 261) // Par_9.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:706: prahṛtā vā mṛtā vāpi tad dhi hetur nipātane // Par_9.9 //
GSD36pars2_pu:708: ādras tu sapalāśaś ca daṇḍa ity abhidhīyate (II,1, p. 262) // Par_9.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:709: mūrchitaḥ patito vāpi daṇḍenābhihitaḥ sa tu /
GSD36pars2_pu:710: utthitas tu yadā gacchet pañca sapta daśaiva vā // Par_9.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:711: grāsaṃ vā yadi gṛhṇīyāt toyaṃ vāpi pibed yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:712: pūrvaṃ vyādhyupasṛṣṭaś cet prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 263) //
GSD36pars2_pu:713: piṇḍasthe pādam ekaṃ tu dvau pādau garbhasaṃmite /
GSD36pars2_pu:714: pādonaṃ vratam uddiṣṭaṃ hatvā garbham acetanam // Par_9.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:716: tripāde tu śikhā varjaṃ saśikhaṃ tu nipātane (II,1, p. 264) // Par_9.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:718: tripāde govṛṣaṃ dadyāc caturthe godvayaṃ smṛtam // Par_9.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:720: aṅgapratyaṅgasaṃpūrṇo dviguṇaṃ govrataṃ caret (II,1, p. 265) // Par_9.16
GSD36pars2_pu:722: śṛṅgabhaṅge caret pādaṃ dvau pādau netraghātane (II,1, p. 266) // Par_9.17
GSD36pars2_pu:723: lāṅgūle pādakṛcchraṃ tu dvau pādāv asthibhañjane /
GSD36pars2_pu:724: tripādaṃ caiva karṇe tu caret sarvaṃ nipātane (II,1, p. 267) // Par_9.18
GSD36pars2_pu:726: yadi jīvati ṣaṇmāsān prāyaścitttaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 268) // Par_9.19
GSD36pars2_pu:727: vraṇabhaṅge ca kartavyaḥ snehābhyaṅgas tu pāṇinā /
GSD36pars2_pu:728: yavasaś copahartavyo yāvad dṛḍhabalo bhavet // Par_9.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:729: yāvat saṃpūrṇasarvāṅgas tāvat taṃ poṣayen naraḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:730: gorūpaṃ brāhmaṇasyāgre namaskṛtvā visarjayet (II,1, p. 269) // Par_9.21 //
GSD36pars2_pu:734: vyāpādayati yo gāṃ tu tasya śuddhiṃ vinirdiśet (II,1, p. 270) // Par_9.23
GSD36pars2_pu:735: caret sāṃtapanaṃ kāṣṭhe prājāpatyaṃ tu loṣṭake /
GSD36pars2_pu:736: taptakṛcchraṃ tu pāṣāṇe sastre caivātikṛcchrakam // Par_9.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:737: pañca saṃtapane gāvaḥ prājāpatye tathā trayaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:738: taptakṛcchre bhavanty aṣṭāv atikṛcchre trayodaśa // Par_9.25 //
GSD36pars2_pu:740: tasyānurūpaṃ mūlyaṃ vā dadyād ity abravīn manuḥ // Par_9.26 //
GSD36pars2_pu:742: sāyaṃ saṃgopanārthaṃ ca na duṣyed rodhabandhayoḥ (II,1, p. 271) //
GSD36pars2_pu:745: atidāhe caret pādaṃ dvau pādau vāhane caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:746: nāsikye padahīnaṃ tu caret sarvaṃ nipātane // Par_9.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:748: uktaṃ parāśareṇaiva hy ekapādaṃ yathāvidhi (II,1, p. 273) // Par_9.30 //
GSD36pars2_pu:749: rodhanaṃ bandhanaṃ caiva bhāraḥ praharaṇaṃ tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:750: durgapreraṇayoktraṃ ca nimittāni vadhasya ṣaṭ // Par_9.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:752: bhavane tasya pāpī syāt prāyaścittārdham arhati (II,1, p. 274) // Par_9.32
GSD36pars2_pu:753: na nārikelair na ca śāṇavālaiḥ na vāpi mauñjair na ca valkaśṛṅkhalaiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:754: etais tu gāvo na nibandhanīyā baddhvāpi tiṣṭhet paraśuṃ gṛhītvā (II,1, p.
GSD36pars2_pu:755: kuśaiḥ kāśaiś ca badhnīyād gopaśuṃ dakṣiṇāmukham /
GSD36pars2_pu:756: pāśalagnāgnidagdhāsu prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 276) // Par_9.34 //
GSD36pars2_pu:757: yadi tatra bhavet kāṣṭhaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:758: japitvā pāvanīṃ devīṃ mucyate tatra kilbiṣāt // Par_9.35 //
GSD36pars2_pu:760: gavāśaneṣu vikrīṇaṃs tataḥ prāpnoti govadham (II,1, p. 277) // Par_9.36 //
GSD36pars2_pu:761: ārādhitas tu yaḥ kaścid bhinnakakṣo yadā bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:762: śravaṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ bhinnaṃ magno vā kūpasaṃkaṭe // Par_9.37 //
GSD36pars2_pu:763: kūpād utkramaṇe caiva bhagno vā grīvapādayoḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:764: sa eva mriyate tatra trīn pādāṃs tu samācaret // Par_9.38 //
GSD36pars2_pu:766: pānīyeṣu vipannānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // Par_9.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:768: anyeṣu dharmakhāteṣu prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 279) // Par_9.40 //
GSD36pars2_pu:769: veśmadvāre nivāseṣu yo naraḥ khātam icchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:772: agnividyudvipannānāṃ prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 280) // Par_9.42 //
GSD36pars2_pu:774: ativṛṣṭihatānāṃ ca prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 281) // Par_9.43 //
GSD36pars2_pu:775: saṃgrāme prahatānāṃ ca ye dagdhā veśmakeṣu ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:776: dāvāgnigrāmaghāteṣu prāyaścittaṃ na vidyāte (II,1, p. 282) // Par_9.44 //
GSD36pars2_pu:778: yatne kṛte vipadyeta prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // Par_9.45 //
GSD36pars2_pu:779: vyāpannānāṃ bahūnāṃ ca bandhane rodhane 'pi vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:780: bhiṣaṅmithyopacāre ca prāyaścittaṃ vinirdiśet (II,1, p. 284) // Par_9.46
GSD36pars2_pu:781: govṛṣāṇāṃ vipattau ca yāvantaḥ prekṣakā janāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:782: anivārayatāṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ pātakaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 285) // Par_9.47 //
GSD36pars2_pu:783: eko hato yair bahubhiḥ sametair na jñāyate yasya hato 'bhighātāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:784: divyena teṣām upalabhya hantā nivartanīyo nṛpasaṃniyuktaiḥ (II,1, p. 286)
GSD36pars2_pu:785: ekā ced bahubhiḥ kācid daivād vyāpāditā yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:786: pādaṃ pādaṃ tu hatyāyāś careyus te pṛthak pṛthak // Par_9.49 //
GSD36pars2_pu:787: hate tu rudhiraṃ dṛśyaṃ vyādhigrastaḥ kṛśo bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:788: lālā bhavati daṣṭeṣu evam anveṣaṇaṃ bhavet // Par_9.50 //
GSD36pars2_pu:789: grāsārthaṃ codito vāpi adhvānaṃ naiva gacchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:790: manunā caivam ekena sarvaśāstrāṇi jānatā (II,1, p. 288) // Par_9.51 //
GSD36pars2_pu:791: prāyaścittaṃ tu tenoktaṃ goghnaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:792: keśānāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya dviguṇaṃ vratam ācaret (II,1, p. 290) // Par_9.52 //
GSD36pars2_pu:793: dviguṇe vrata ādiṣṭe dviguṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:794: rājā vā rājaputro vā brāhmaṇo vā bahuśrutaḥ // Par_9.53 //
GSD36pars2_pu:796: sarvān keśān samuddhṛtya cchedayed aṅguladvayam (II,1, p. 291) // Par_9.54
GSD36pars2_pu:798: na striyāḥ keśavapanaṃ na dūre śayanāśanam (II,1, p. 292) // Par_9.55 //
GSD36pars2_pu:799: na ca goṣṭhe vased rātrau na divā gā anuvrajet /
GSD36pars2_pu:800: nadīṣu saṃgame caiva araṇyeṣu viśeṣataḥ // Par_9.56 //
GSD36pars2_pu:801: na strīṇām ajinaṃ vāso vratam eva samācaret /
GSD36pars2_pu:802: trisaṃdhyaṃ snānam ity uktaṃ surāṇām arcanaṃ tathā (II,1, p. 293) //
GSD36pars2_pu:804: gṛheṣu satataṃ tiṣṭhec chucir niyamam ācaret // Par_9.58 //
GSD36pars2_pu:805: iha yo govadhaṃ kṛtvā pracchādayitum icchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:806: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ kālasūtram asaṃśayam (II,1, p. 294) // Par_9.59 //
GSD36pars2_pu:808: klībo duḥkhī ca kuṣṭhī ca sapta janmāni vai naraḥ // Par_9.60 //
GSD36pars2_pu:809: tasmāt prakāśayet pāpaṃ svadharmaṃ satataṃ caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:812: agamyā gamane caiva śuddhyai cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret (II,1, p. 297) // Par_10.1
GSD36pars2_pu:813: ekaikaṃ hrāsayed grāsaṃ kṛṣṇe śukle ca vardhayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:814: amāvāsyāṃ na bhuñjīta hy eṣa cāndrāyaṇo vidhiḥ (II,1, p. 298) // Par_10.2
GSD36pars2_pu:816: anyāthā bhāvadoṣeṇa na dharmo na ca śudhyati (II,1, p. 304) // Par_10.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:818: godvayaṃ vastrayugmaṃ ca dadyād vipreṣu dakṣiṇām (II,1, p. 305) //
GSD36pars2_pu:819: caṇḍālīṃ vā śvapākīṃ vā hy abhigacchati yo dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:822: godvayaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāc chuddhiṃ pārāśaro 'bravīt (II,1, p. 306) //
GSD36pars2_pu:823: kṣatriyo vātha vaiśyo vā caṇḍālīṃ gacchato yadi /
GSD36pars2_pu:824: prājāpatyadvayaṃ kuryād dadyād gomithunadvayam (II,1, p. 307) // Par_10.7
GSD36pars2_pu:825: śvapākīṃ vātha caṇḍālīṃ śūdro vā yadi gacchati /
GSD36pars2_pu:826: prājāpatyaṃ caret kṛcchraṃ catur gomithunaṃ dadet // Par_10.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:827: mātaraṃ yadi gacchet tu bhaginīṃ svasutāṃ tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:828: etās tu mohito gatvā trīṇi kṛcchrāṇi saṃcaret (II,1, p. 311) // Par_10.9
GSD36pars2_pu:831: ajñānena tu yo gacchet kuryāc cāndrāyaṇadvayam /
GSD36pars2_pu:832: daśa gomithunaṃ dadyāc chuddhiṃ pāraśaro 'bravīt (II,1, p. 317) //
GSD36pars2_pu:833: pitṛdārān samāruhya mātur āptāṃ tu bhrātṛjām /
GSD36pars2_pu:834: gurupātnīṃ snuṣāṃ caiva bhrātṛbhāryāṃ tathaiva ca (II,1, p. 319) //
GSD36pars2_pu:836: godvayaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyāc chudhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Par_10.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:838: kharīṃ ca sūkarīṃ gatvā prājāpatyavrataṃ caret (II,1, p. 339) // Par_10.14
GSD36pars2_pu:839: gogāmī ca trirātreṇa gām ekāṃ brāhmaṇe dadan /
GSD36pars2_pu:840: mahiṣyuṣṭrīkharīgāmī tv ahorātreṇa śudhyati (II,1, p. 342) // Par_10.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:841: ḍāmare samare vāpi durbhikṣe vā janakṣaye /
GSD36pars2_pu:842: bandigrāhe bhayārtā vā sadā svastrīṃ nirīkṣayet // Par_10.16 //
GSD36pars2_pu:843: caṇḍālaiḥ saha saṃparkaṃ yā nārī kurute tataḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:844: viprān daśa varān kṛtvā svakaṃ doṣaṃ prakāśayet (II,1, p. 343) //
GSD36pars2_pu:846: tatra sthitvā nirāhārā tv ahorātreṇa niṣkramet // Par_10.18 //
GSD36pars2_pu:848: trirātram upavāsitvā tv ekarātraṃ jale vaset // Par_10.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:850: suvarṇaṃ pañcagavyaṃ ca kvāthayitvā pibej jalam // Par_10.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:851: ekabhaktaṃ caret paścād yāvat puṣpavatī bhavet /
GSD36pars2_pu:852: vrataṃ carati tad yāvat tāvat saṃvasate bahiḥ (II,1, p. 344) // Par_10.21
GSD36pars2_pu:854: godvayaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyac chuddhiṃ pārāśaro 'bravīt (II,1, p. 345) //
GSD36pars2_pu:856: yathā bhūmis tathā nārī tasmāt tāṃ na tu dūṣayet (II,1, p. 346) //
GSD36pars2_pu:857: bandigrāheṇa yā bhuktā hatvā baddhvā balād bhayāt /
GSD36pars2_pu:858: kṛtvā sāṃtapanaṃ kṛcchraṃ śudhyet pārāśaro 'bravīt (II,1, p. 347) //
GSD36pars2_pu:859: sakṛd bhuktā tu yā nārī necchantī pāpakarmabhiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:861: pataty ardhaṃ śarīrasya yasya bhāryā surāṃ pibet /
GSD36pars2_pu:862: patitārdhaśarīrasya niṣkṛtir na vidhīyate (II,1, p. 349) // Par_10.26 //
GSD36pars2_pu:863: gāyatrīṃ japamānas tu kṛcchraṃ sāṃtapanaṃ caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:864: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam (II,1, p. 351) // Par_10.27
GSD36pars2_pu:866: jāreṇa janayed garbhaṃ mṛte 'vyakte gate patau (II,1, p. 352) // Par_10.28
GSD36pars2_pu:867: tāṃ tyajed apare rāṣṭre patitāṃ pāpakāriṇīm /
GSD36pars2_pu:868: brāhmaṇī tu yadā gacchet parapuṃsā samanvitā (II,1, p. 354) // Par_10.29
GSD36pars2_pu:869: sā tu naṣṭā vinirdiṣṭā na tasyāgamanaṃ punaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:870: kāmān mohāt tu yā gacchet tyaktvā bandhūn sutān patim (II,1, p. 356) //
GSD36pars2_pu:871: sā tu naṣṭā pare loke mānuṣeṣu viśeṣataḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:874: daśame tu dine prāpte prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate (II,1, p. 358) // Par_10.32
GSD36pars2_pu:875: daśāhaṃ na tyajen nārīṃ tyajen naṣṭaśrutāṃ tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:876: bhartā caiva caret kṛcchraṃ kṛcchārdhaṃ caiva bāndhavāḥ // Par_10.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:877: teṣāṃ bhuktvā ca pītvā ca ahorātreṇa śudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:878: brāhmaṇī tu yadā gacchet parapuṃsā vivarjitā (II,1, p. 359) // Par_10.34
GSD36pars2_pu:879: gatvā puṃsāṃ śataṃ yāti tyajeyus tāṃ tu gotriṇaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:880: puṃso yadi gṛhe gacchet tad aśuddhaṃ gṛhaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 360) //
GSD36pars2_pu:881: patimātṛgṛhaṃ yac ca jārasyaiva tu tad gṛham /
GSD36pars2_pu:882: ullikhya tad gṛhaṃ paścāt pañcagavyena secayet // Par_10.36 //
GSD36pars2_pu:883: tyajec ca mṛṇmayaṃ pātraṃ vastraṃ kāṣṭhaṃ ca śodhayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:884: saṃbhārān śodhayet sarvān gobālaiś ca phalodbhavān // Par_10.37 //
GSD36pars2_pu:886: prāyaścittaṃ cared vipro brāhmaṇair upapāditam // Par_10.38 //
GSD36pars2_pu:888: itareṣām ahorātraṃ pañcagavyaṃ ca śodhanam // Par_10.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:891: ākāśaṃ vāyur agniś ca medhyaṃ bhūmigataṃ jalam /
GSD36pars2_pu:892: na praduṣyanti darbhāś ca yajñeṣu camasā yathā // Par_10.41 //
GSD36pars2_pu:894: yadi bhuktaṃ tu vipreṇa kṛcchraṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret (II,1, p. 364) //
GSD36pars2_pu:895: tathaiva kṣatriyo vaiśyo 'py ardhaṃ cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:896: śūdro 'py evaṃ yadā bhuṅkte prājāpatyaṃ samācaret (II,1, p. 374) //
GSD36pars2_pu:897: pañcagavyaṃ pibec chūdro brahmakūrcaṃ pibed dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:898: ekadvitricatur gā vā dadyād viprādyanukramāt // Par_11.3 //
GSD36pars2_pu:899: śūdrānnaṃ sūtakānnaṃ ca abhojyasyānnam eva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:900: śaṅkitaṃ pratiṣiddhānnaṃ pūrvocchiṣṭaṃ tathaiva ca (II,1, p. 375) //
GSD36pars2_pu:901: yadi bhuktaṃ tu vipreṇa ajñānād āpadāpi vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:902: jñātvā samācaret kṛcchraṃ brahmakūrcaṃ tu pāvanam // Par_11.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:904: tiladarbhodakaiḥ prokṣya śudhyate nātrasaṃśayaḥ (II,1, p. 390) // Par_11.6
GSD36pars2_pu:906: yady eko 'pi tyajet pātraṃ śeṣam annaṃ na bhojayet (II,1, p. 398) //
GSD36pars2_pu:907: mohād bhuñjīta yas tatra paṅktāv ucchiṣṭabhojane /
GSD36pars2_pu:908: prāyaścittaṃ cared vipraḥ kṛcchraṃ sāṃtapanaṃ tathā // Par_11.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:913: maṇḍūkaṃ bhakṣayitvā tu mūṣikāmāṃsam eva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:914: jñātvā vipras tv ahorātraṃ yāvakānnena śudhyati (II,1, p. 405) //
GSD36pars2_pu:915: kṣatriyaś cāpi vaiśyaś ca kriyāvantau śucivratau /
GSD36pars2_pu:916: tadgṛhe tu dvijair bhojyaṃ havyakavyeṣu nityaśaḥ (II,1, p. 410) //
GSD36pars2_pu:917: ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ tathā kṣīraṃ bhakṣyaṃ snehena pācitam /
GSD36pars2_pu:918: gatvā nadītaṭe vipro bhuñjīyāc chūdrabhojanam (II,1, p. 411) // Par_11.13
GSD36pars2_pu:920: taṃ śūdraṃ varjayed vipraḥ śvapākam iva dūrataḥ (II,1, p. 416) //
GSD36pars2_pu:922: svakarmaṇi ratān nityaṃ na tān śūdrān tyajed dvijaḥ // Par_11.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:923: ajñānād bhuñjate viprāḥ sūtake mṛtake 'pi vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:924: prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ varṇe varṇe vinirdiśet (II,1, p. 417) //
GSD36pars2_pu:927: brāhmaṇasya yadā bhuṅkte dve sahasre tu dāpayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:930: pakvaṃ vipragṛhe bhuktaṃ bhojyaṃ tan manur abravīt (II,1, p. 427) //
GSD36pars2_pu:932: manastāpena śudhyeta drupadāṃ vā japec chatam // Par_11.20 //
GSD36pars2_pu:934: ete śūdreṣu bhojyānnā yaś cātmānaṃ nivedayet (II,1, p. 429) // Par_11.21
GSD36pars2_pu:936: saṃskārāt tu bhaved dāsaḥ asaṃskārāt tu nāpitaḥ // Par_11.22 //
GSD36pars2_pu:937: kṣatriyāc chūdrakanyāyāṃ samutpannas tu yaḥ sutaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:938: sa gopāla iti jñeyo bhojyo viprair na saṃśayaḥ // Par_11.23 //
GSD36pars2_pu:940: sa hy ārdhika iti jñeyo bhojyo viprair na saṃśayaḥ // Par_11.24 //
GSD36pars2_pu:941: bhāṇḍasthitam abhojyeṣu jalaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ payaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:942: akāmatas tu yo bhuṅkte prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhavet (II,1, p. 432) //
GSD36pars2_pu:943: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā upasarpati /
GSD36pars2_pu:945: śūdrāṇāṃ nopavāsaḥ syāc chūdro dānena śudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:946: brahmakūrcam ahorātraṃ śvapākam api śodhayet // Par_11.27 //
GSD36pars2_pu:947: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GSD36pars2_pu:948: nirdiṣṭaṃ pañcagavyaṃ tu pavitraṃ pāpaśodhanam (II,1, p. 433) // Par_11.28
GSD36pars2_pu:950: payaś ca tāmravarṇāyā raktāyā gṛhyate dadhi // Par_11.29 //
GSD36pars2_pu:951: kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ grāhyaṃ sarvaṃ kāpilam eva vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:952: mūtram ekapalaṃ dadyād aṅguṣṭhārdhaṃ tu gomayam (II,1, p. 434) //
GSD36pars2_pu:953: kṣīraṃ saptapalaṃ dadyād dadhi tripalam ucyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:954: ghṛtam ekapalaṃ dadyāt palam ekaṃ kuśodakam // Par_11.31 //
GSD36pars2_pu:956: āpyāyasveti ca kṣīraṃ dadhikrāvṇas tathā dadhi (II,1, p. 435) // Par_11.32
GSD36pars2_pu:957: tejo 'si śukram ity ājyaṃ devasya tvā kuśodakam /
GSD36pars2_pu:958: pañcagavyam ṛcā pūtaṃ sthāpayed agnisaṃnidhau // Par_11.33 //
GSD36pars2_pu:960: saptāvarās tu ye darbhā achinnāgrāḥ śukatviṣaḥ (II,1, p. 436) // Par_11.34
GSD36pars2_pu:962: irāvatī idaṃ viṣṇur mānastoketi śaṃvatī (II,1, p. 437) // Par_11.35 //
GSD36pars2_pu:963: etābhiś caiva hotavyaṃ hutaśeṣaṃ pibed dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:964: āloḍya praṇavenaiva nirmanthya praṇavena tu (II,1, p. 438) // Par_11.36 //
GSD36pars2_pu:965: uddhṛtya praṇavenaiva pibec ca praṇavena tu /
GSD36pars2_pu:966: yat tv asthigataṃ pāpaṃ dehe tiṣṭhati dehinām // Par_11.37 //
GSD36pars2_pu:968: pavitraṃ triṣu lokeṣu devatābhir adhiṣṭhitam (II,1, p. 439) // Par_11.38
GSD36pars2_pu:970: dadhni vāyuḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ somaḥ kṣīre ghṛte raviḥ // Par_11.39 //
GSD36pars2_pu:972: apeyaṃ tad vijānīyāt pītvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret (II,1, p. 440) // Par_11.40
GSD36pars2_pu:973: kūpe ca patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śvasṛgālau ca markaṭam /
GSD36pars2_pu:974: asthicarmādi patitaṃ pītvāmedhyā apo dvijaḥ // Par_11.41 //
GSD36pars2_pu:976: gāvayaṃ saupratīkaṃ ca māyūraṃ khāḍgakaṃ tathā // Par_11.42 //
GSD36pars2_pu:977: vaiyāghram ārkṣaṃ saiṃhaṃ vā kūpe yadi nimajjati /
GSD36pars2_pu:978: taṭākasyātha duṣṭasya pītaṃ syād udakaṃ yadi (II,1, p. 441) // Par_11.43
GSD36pars2_pu:980: vipraḥ śudhyet trirātreṇa kṣatriyas tu dinadvayāt // Par_11.44 //
GSD36pars2_pu:981: ekāhena tu vaiśyas tu śūdro naktena śudhyati /
GSD36pars2_pu:983: apacasya ca bhuktvānnaṃ dvijaś cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret /
GSD36pars2_pu:984: apacasya ca yad dānaṃ dātuś cāsya kutaḥ phalam // Par_11.46 //
GSD36pars2_pu:985: dātā pratigrahītā ca tau dvau nirayagāminau /
GSD36pars2_pu:986: gṛhītvāgniṃ samāropya pañcayajñān na nirvapet (II,1, p. 447) // Par_11.47
GSD36pars2_pu:989: satataṃ prātar utthāya parapākaratas tu saḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:990: gṛhasthadharmā yo vipro dadāti parivarjitaḥ // Par_11.49 //
GSD36pars2_pu:992: yuge yuge tu ye dharmās teṣu teṣu ca ye dvijāḥ (II,1, p. 451) // Par_11.50
GSD36pars2_pu:993: teṣāṃ nindā na kartavyā yugarūpā hi te dvijāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:994: huṃkāraṃ brāhmaṇasyoktvā tvaṃkāraṃ ca garīyasaḥ // Par_11.51 //
GSD36pars2_pu:995: snātvā tiṣṭhann ahaḥ śeṣam abhivādya prasādayet /
GSD36pars2_pu:996: tāḍayitvā tṛṇenāpi kaṇṭhe baddhvāpi vāsasā // Par_11.52 //
GSD36pars2_pu:998: avagūrya tv ahorātraṃ trirātraṃ kṣitipātane (II,1, p. 455) // Par_11.53 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1000: navāham atikṛcchrī syāt pāṇipūrānnabhojanaḥ (II,1, p. 459) // Par_11.54 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1001: trirātram upavāsī syād atikṛcchraḥ sa ucyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:1002: sarveṣām eva pāpānāṃ saṃkare samupasthite (II,1, p. 460) // Par_11.55 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1003: daśasāhasram abhyastā gāyatrī śodhanaṃ paraṃ // Par_11.56 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1004: duḥsvapnaṃ yadi paśyet tu vānte tu kṣurakarmaṇi /
GSD36pars2_pu:1005: maithune pretadhūme ca snānam eva vidhīyate (II,2, p. 1) // Par_12.1 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1006: ajñānāt prāśya viṇmūtraṃ surāsaṃspṛṣṭam eva ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:1007: punaḥ saṃskāram arhanti trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ (II,2, p. 5) // Par_12.2 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1008: ajinaṃ mekhalā daṇḍo bhaikṣyacaryā vratāni ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:1011: pañcagavyaṃ ca kurvīta snātvā pītvā śucir bhavet (II,2, p. 6) // Par_12.4
GSD36pars2_pu:1013: pratyāvasitavarṇānāṃ kathaṃ śuddhir vidhīyate (II,2, p. 7) // Par_12.5 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1015: vṛṣaikādaśadānena varṇāḥ śudhyanti te trayaḥ // Par_12.6 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1017: saśikhaṃ vapanaṃ kṛtvā prājāpatyadvayaṃ caret // Par_12.7 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1019: mucyate tena pāpena brāhmaṇatvaṃ ca gacchati // Par_12.8 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1021: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyam eva ca (II,2, p. 13) // Par_12.9
GSD36pars2_pu:1022: āgneyaṃ bhasmanā snānam avagāhya tu vāruṇam /
GSD36pars2_pu:1023: āpo hi ṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam // Par_12.10 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1024: yat tu sātapavarṣeṇa tat snānaṃ divyam ucyate /
GSD36pars2_pu:1025: tatra snātvā tu gaṅgāyāṃ snāto bhavati mānavaḥ // Par_12.11 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1026: snātuṃ yāntaṃ dvijaṃ sarve devāḥ pitṛgaṇaiḥ saha /
GSD36pars2_pu:1027: vāyubhūtās tu gacchanti tṛṣārtāḥ salilārthinaḥ (II,2, p. 17) // Par_12.12
GSD36pars2_pu:1029: tasmān na pīḍayed vastraṃ akṛtvā pitṛtarpaṇam // Par_12.13 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1030: romakūpeṣv avasthāpya yas tilair tarpayet pitṝn /
GSD36pars2_pu:1031: pitaras tarpitās tena rudhireṇa malena ca (II,2, p. 18) // Par_12.14 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1032: avadhūnoti yaḥ keśān snātvā yas tūtsṛjen malam /
GSD36pars2_pu:1033: ācāmed vā jalasthe 'pi sa bāhyaḥ pitṛdaivataiḥ // Par_12.15 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1034: śiraḥ prāvṛttya kaṇṭhaṃ vā muktakacchaśikho 'pi vā /
GSD36pars2_pu:1035: vinā yajñopavītena ācānto 'py aśucir bhavet (II,2, p. 19) // Par_12.16 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1036: jale sthalastho nācāmej jalasthaś ca bahiḥsthale /
GSD36pars2_pu:1037: ubhe spṛṣṭvā samācānta ubhayatra śucir bhavet // Par_12.17 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1038: snātvā pītvā kṣute supte bhuktvā rathyopasarpaṇe /
GSD36pars2_pu:1039: ācāntaḥ punar ācāmed vāso viparidhāya ca (II,2, p. 20) // Par_12.18 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1041: patitānāṃ ca saṃbhāṣe dakṣiṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ spṛśet // Par_12.19 //
GSD36pars2_pu:1043: viprasya dakṣiṇe karṇe santīti manur abravīt (II,2, p. 20; not in BI) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1044: agnir āpaś ca vedāś ca somasūryānilās tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:1045: sarva eva tu viprasya śrotre tiṣṭhanti dakṣiṇe // Par_12.21(20) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1046: bhāskarasya karaiḥ pūtaṃ divā snānaṃ praśasyāte /
GSD36pars2_pu:1047: apraśastaṃ niśi snānaṃ rāhor anyatra darśanāt (II,2, p. 21) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1048: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homaḥ kartavyo rāhudarśane /
GSD36pars2_pu:1049: anyadā tv aśucī rātris tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet // Par_12.23(22) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1050: maruto vasavo rudrā ādityāś caiva devatāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1051: sarve some pralīyante tasmād dānaṃ tu tadgrahe (II,2, p. 22) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1052: khalayajñe vivāhe ca saṃkrāntau grahaṇe tathā /
GSD36pars2_pu:1053: śarvaryāṃ dānam asty eva nānyatraiva vidhīyate // Par_12.25(24) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1055: rāhoś ca darśane dānaṃ praśastaṃ nānyadā niśi // Par_12.26(25) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1057: pradoṣapaścimau yāmau dinavat snānam ācaret // Par_12.27(26) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1059: etāṃs tu brāhmaṇaḥ spṛṣṭvā savāsā jalam āviśet (II,2, p. 24) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1061: antardaśāhe viprasya hy ūrdhvam ācamanaṃ bhavet // Par_12.29(28) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1064: kuśaiḥ pūtaṃ tu yat snānaṃ kuśenopaspṛśed dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1065: kuśena coddhṛtaṃ toyaṃ somapānasamaṃ bhavet (II,2, p. 26) // Par_12.31(30)
GSD36pars2_pu:1067: vedaṃ caaivānadhīyānāḥ sarve te vṛṣalāḥ smṛtāḥ // Par_12.32(31) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1069: adhyetavyo 'py ekadeśo yadi sarvaṃ na śakyate (II,2, p. 27) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1071: japato juhvato vāpi gatir ūrdhvā na vidyate // Par_12.34(33) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1073: śūdrāj jñānāgamaś caiva jvalantam api pātayet (II,2, p. 28) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1074: yaḥ śūdryā pācayen nityaṃ śūdrī ca gṛhamedhinī /
GSD36pars2_pu:1075: varjitaḥ pitṛdevebhyo rauravaṃ yāti sa dvijaḥ (II,2, p. 29) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1077: ahaṃ tan na vijānāmi kāṃ kāṃ yoniṃ gamiṣyati // Par_12.37(36) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1079: śvayonau saptajanmā syād ity evaṃ manur abravīt (II,2, p. 30) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1080: dakṣiṇārtham tu yo vipraḥ śūdrasya juhuyād dhaviḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1081: brāhmaṇas tu bhavec chūdraḥ śūdras tu brāhmaṇo bhavet // Par_12.39(38) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1082: maunavrataṃ samāśritya āsīno na vaded dvijaḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1083: bhuñjāno hi vaded yas tu tad annaṃ parivarjayet (II,2, p. 31) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1084: ardhe bhukte tu yo vipras tasmin pātre jalaṃ pibet /
GSD36pars2_pu:1085: hataṃ daivaṃ ca pitryaṃ ca ātmānaṃ copaghātayet // Par_12.41(40) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1086: bhuñjāneṣu tu vipreṣu yo 'gre pātraṃ vimuñcati /
GSD36pars2_pu:1087: sa mūḍhaḥ sa ca pāpiṣṭho brahmaghnaḥ sa khalūcyate (II,2, p. 32) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1088: bhājaneṣu ca tiṣṭhatsu svastikurvanti ye dvijāḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1089: na devās tṛptim āyānti nirāśāḥ pitaras tathā // Par_12.43(42) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1090: asnātvā naiva bhuñjītā ajaptvāgnim ahūya ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:1091: parṇapṛṣṭhe na bhuñjīta rātrau dīpaṃ vinā tathā // Par_12.44(43) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1095: anyāyena tu yo jīvet sarvakarmabahiṣkṛtaḥ // Par_12.46(45) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1096: agnicit kapilā satrī rājā bhikṣur mahodadhiḥ /
GSD36pars2_pu:1097: dṛṣṭamātrāḥ punanty ete tasmāt paśyet tu nityaśaḥ (II,2, p. 34) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1099: tilān kṛṣṇājinaṃ chāgaṃ gṛhe caitāni rakṣayet (II,2, p. 35) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1100: gavāṃ śataṃ saikavṛṣaṃ yatra tiṣṭhaty ayantritam /
GSD36pars2_pu:1103: etad gocarmadānena mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ (II,2, p. 36) // Par_12.50(49)
GSD36pars2_pu:1105: yad dānaṃ dīyate tasmai tad dānaṃ śubhakārakam (II,2, p. 37) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1107: gavāṃ koṭipradānena bhūmihartā na śudhyati // Par_12.52(51) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1109: ata ūrdhvaṃ trirātraṃ syād uśanā munir abravīt (II,2, p. 38) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1110: yugaṃ yugadvayaṃ caiva triyugaṃ ca caturyugam /
GSD36pars2_pu:1113: snātvāvalokayet sūryam ajñānāt spṛśate yadi (II,2, p. 39) // Par_12.55(54)
GSD36pars2_pu:1115: toyaṃ pibati vaktreṇa śvayonau jāyate dhruvam // Par_12.56(55) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1116: yas tu kruddhaḥ pumān brūyāj jāyāyās tu agamyatām /
GSD36pars2_pu:1117: punar icchati ced enāṃ vipramadhye tu śrāvayet (II,2, p. 40) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1119: dānaṃ puṇyam akṛtvā tu prāyaścittaṃ dinatrayam // Par_12.58(57) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1121: cīrṇānte caiva gāṃ dadyād brāhmaṇān bhojayed daśa // Par_12.59(58) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1123: annaṃ bhuktvā dvijaḥ kuryād dinam ekam abhojanam (II,2, p. 45) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1125: bhuktvānnaṃ mucyate pāpād ahorātrāntarān naraḥ // Par_12.61(60) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1127: kṛcchratrayaṃ prakurvīta aśaucamaraṇe tathā (II,2, p. 46) // Par_12.62(61)
GSD36pars2_pu:1131: gṛhasthaḥ kāmataḥ kuryād retasaḥ skhalanaṃ bhuvi (II,2, p. 48) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1132: sahasraṃ tu japed devyāḥ prāṇāyāmais tribhiḥ saha /
GSD36pars2_pu:1137: ahaṃ duṣkṛtakarmā vai mahāpātakakārakaḥ (II,2, p. 51) // Par_12.67(66) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1139: gokuleṣu vasec caiva grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā // Par_12.68(67) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1141: eteṣu khyāpayann enaḥ puṇyaṃ gatvā tu sāgaram (II,2, p. 52) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1145: setuṃ dṛṣṭvā viśuddhātmā tv avagāheta sāgaram // Par_12.71(70) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1147: punaḥ pratyāgate veśma vāsārtham upasarpati (II,2, p. 54) // Par_12.72(71)
GSD36pars2_pu:1148: saputraḥ saha bhṛtyaiś ca kuryād brāhmaṇabhojanam /
GSD36pars2_pu:1149: gāś caivaikaśataṃ dadyāc caturvidhyeṣu dakṣiṇām // Par_12.73(72) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1151: savanasthāṃ striyaṃ hatvā brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret (II,2, p. 76) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1152: madyapaś ca dvijaḥ kuryān nadīṃ gatvā samudragām /
GSD36pars2_pu:1153: cāndrāyaṇe tataś cīrṇe kuryād brāhmaṇabhojanam (II,2, p. 77) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1154: anaḍutsahitāṃ gāṃ ca dadyād vipreṣu dakṣiṇām /
GSD36pars2_pu:1155: surāpānaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā agnivarṇaṃ surāṃ pibet (II,2, p. 80) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1156: sa pāvayed athātmānam ihaloke paratra ca /
GSD36pars2_pu:1157: apahṛtya suvarṇaṃ tu brāhmaṇasya tataḥ svayam (II,2, p. 84) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1158: gacchen musalam ādāya rājābhyāśaṃ vadhāya tu /
GSD36pars2_pu:1159: tataḥ śuddhim avāpnoti rājñāsau mukta eva ca // Par_12.78(77) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1160: kāmatas tu kṛtaṃ yat syān nānyathā vadham arhati /
GSD36pars2_pu:1161: āsanāc chayanād yānāt saṃbhāṣāt saha bhojanāt (II,2, p. 90) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1163: cāndrāyaṇaṃ yāvakaṃ tu tulāpuruṣa eva ca (II,2, p. 91) // Par_12.80(79) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1166: dvinavatyā samāyuktaṃ dharmaśāstrasya saṃgrahaḥ (II,2, p. 287; BI: 534) //
GSD36pars2_pu:1169: NO MŪLA TEXT FOR MĀDHAVA's ṬĪKĀ on VYAVAHĀRAKĀṆḌA (Vol. 3, Parts
